Package collectogame

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • collectogame.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board for the Collecto game. Team Yellow 1.3's Module2 final project.
    Author:
    Vo Nhat Minh and Jesse Snoijer

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public int index​(int row,
                 int column)
        Calculates the index in the linear array of fields from a (row, column) pair.
        Parameters:
        row - - the row value
        column - - the column value
        Returns:
        the index belonging to the (row,column)-field
        Requires
        row to be between 0 and DIM, column to be between 0 and DIM

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(int index)
        Returns true if index is a valid index of a field on the board.
        Parameters:
        index - - the index value of the field
        Returns:
        true if index is in field
        Ensures
        a positive result when the index is between 0 and DIM*DIM

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(int row,
                       int col)
        Returns true of the (row,col) pair refers to a valid field on the board.
        Parameters:
        row - - the row value
        col - - the column value
        Returns:
        true if row and col are in range
        Ensures
        true when both row and col are within the board's bounds

      • setField

        public void setField​(int i,
                     Ball b)
        Sets the content of field i to the ball b.
        Parameters:
        i - the field number (see NUMBERING)
        b - the ball to be placed
        Requires
        i to be a valid field
        Ensures
        field i to be set to Ball b

      • setField

        public void setField​(int row,
                     int col,
                     Ball b)
        Sets the content of the field represented by the (row,col) pair to the Ball b.
        Parameters:
        row - the field's row
        col - the field's column
        b - the Ball to be placed
        Requires
        (row, col) to be a valid field
        Ensures
        field (row, col) to be set to Ball

      • getField

        public Ball getField​(int i)
        Returns the content of the field i.
        Parameters:
        i - the number of the field (see NUMBERING)
        Returns:
        the Ball on the field
        Requires
        i to be a valid field
        Ensures
        the result to be either BLUE, YELLOW, RED, ORANGE, PURPLE, GREEN or EMPTY

      • getField

        public Ball getField​(int row,
                     int column)
        Returns the content of the field i, j.
        Parameters:
        column - the column of the field (see NUMBERING)
        row - the row of the field (see NUMBERING)
        Returns:
        the Ball on the field
        Requires
        i, j to be a valid field
        Ensures
        the result to be either BLUE, YELLOW, RED, ORANGE, PURPLE, GREEN or EMPTY

      • deepCopy

        public Board deepCopy()
        Creates a deep copy of this field.
        Returns:
        the copy version of the board
        Ensures
        the result is a new object, so not this object, the values of all fields of the copy match the ones of this Board

      • isValidPosition

        public boolean isValidPosition​(int row,
                               int col)
        Check if place ball's color in this place is correct or not.
        Parameters:
        row - is the row number of field
        col - is the column number of field
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid position
        Requires
        row, col to be a valid field
        Ensures
        return false if one of the surrounding balls is not EMPTY but has same color;

      • isValidPosition

        public boolean isValidPosition​(int row,
                               int col,
                               Ball ball)
        Check if the ball's color can be placed in this position or not.
        Parameters:
        row - is the row number of field
        col - is the column number of field
        ball - is the ball to be checked
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid position
        Requires
        row, col to be a valid field
        Ensures
        return false if one of the surrounding balls is not EMPTY but has same color

      • initializeNewBoard

        public void initializeNewBoard()
        Initialize a new random board.
        Requires
        \forall(getField(index)) == null;
        Ensures
        isValidBoard() == true;

      • isCollectableBoard

        public boolean isCollectableBoard()
        Check the board after moves has any pairs of ball with same color.
        Returns:
        return true if find a pair of ball with same color || otherwise false;
        Ensures
        return true if \exist !isValidPosition(i,j);

      • findSwapPosition

        public int findSwapPosition​(int row,
                            int col)
        Find index position that ball in row, col can swap, if not return the current position.
        Parameters:
        row - of the position needed to swap
        col - of the position needed to swap
        Returns:
        the index position that ball in row, col can swap
        Requires
        isField(row, col)
        Ensures
        isField(i,j)

      • makeSingleMove

        public boolean makeSingleMove​(int indice)
        Makes a move on with the given move number.
        Parameters:
        indice - the move you want to make (see toString)
        Returns:
        false if move is not possible cause of a full column or row || true
        Requires
        move is a valid move
        Ensures
        the move is successfully completed without losing balls

      • makeDoubleMove

        public boolean makeDoubleMove​(int indice1,
                              int indice2)
        Makes a double move on with the given move numbers.
        Parameters:
        indice1 - the first move you want to make (see toString)
        indice2 - the second move you want to make (see toString)
        Returns:
        false if moves are not possible cause of a full collumn or row || true
        Requires
        the moves are valid moves
        Ensures
        the move is successfully completed without losing balls

      • moveLtoR

        public int moveLtoR​(int indice)
        Calculate the Row number need to move from Left to Right.
        Parameters:
        indice - - the move number that you want to make (see toString)
        Returns:
        -1 if not a Left to Right move || row number is corresponding to move
        Requires
        indice is between 0 and 27
        Ensures
        indice is between 13 and 7

      • moveRtoL

        public int moveRtoL​(int indice)
        Calculate the Row number need to move from Left to Right.
        Parameters:
        indice - - the move number that you want to make (see toString)
        Returns:
        -1 if not a Right to Left move || row number is corresponding to move
        Requires
        indice is between 0 and 27
        Ensures
        indice is between 0 and 6

      • moveUtoD

        public int moveUtoD​(int indice)
        Calculate the Column number need to move from Up to Down.
        Parameters:
        indice - - the move number that you want to make (see toString)
        Returns:
        -1 if not a Up to Down move || column number is corresponding to move
        Requires
        indice is between 0 and 27
        Ensures
        indice is between 21 and 27

      • moveDtoU

        public int moveDtoU​(int indice)
        Calculate the Column number need to move from Down to Up.
        Parameters:
        indice - - the move number that you want to make (see toString)
        Returns:
        -1 if not a Down to Up move || column number is corresponding to move
        Requires
        indice is between 0 and 27
        Ensures
        indice is between 14 and 20

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of this board. In addition to the current situation, the String also shows with arrows which number belongs to which move.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the game situation as String
        Requires
        the board is initialed, so all the indexes contain a value (can be EMPTY)

      • isValidSingleMove

        public boolean isValidSingleMove​(int indice)
        Checks if the singleMove is a valid move, so move returns in colecting balls.
        Parameters:
        indice - the number of the move that you want to make
        Returns:
        true if the given move is a valid move otherwise will return false
        Ensures
        the return is false if indice is out of range

      • isValidDoubleMove

        public boolean isValidDoubleMove​(int indice1,
                                 int indice2)
        Checks if the doubleMove is a valid move, so double move returns in collecting balls.
        Parameters:
        indice1 - the number of the first move that you want to make
        indice2 - the number of the second move that you want to make
        Returns:
        true if the given move is a valid move otherwise will return false
        Ensures
        the return is false if indice is out of range

      • isStillPossibleSingleMove

        public boolean isStillPossibleSingleMove()
        Checks if there is a singleMove possible, so a move returns in colecting balls.
        Returns:
        true if there is a singleMove possible otherwise false
        Ensures
        the return is false if there is no singleMove possible

      • isStillPossibleDoubleMove

        public boolean isStillPossibleDoubleMove()
        Checks if there is a doubleMove possible, so a move returns in collecting balls.
        Returns:
        true if there is a doubleMove possible otherwise false
        Ensures
        the return is false if there is no doubleMove possible

      • collectBall

        public java.util.List<Ball> collectBall()
        Collect all the scored balls after a move.
        Returns:
        a collectedList of all balls in Invalid Position;
        Requires
        \forall(isValidPosition(getField(index)) == true);
        Ensures
        (isCollectableBoard() == true);

      • isEndGame

        public boolean isEndGame()
        GameOver when there is no possible move.
        Returns:
        true if game is over otherwise false
        Requires
        (isStillPossibleSingleMove() == false) and (isStillPossibleDoubleMove() == false)
